page.title: 05CHILDRENS GAMES IN WREXHAM
page.content: { { {KNOCK AND RUN }Is a game where you knock on a door and run. {GRAND NATIONAL }Is a game where you jump over fences,hedges and walls. {FOXES AND HOUNDS }Is a game where the people who are the hounds chase the people who are the foxes. {BRITISH BULLDOGS}Is where someone is in the middle of a square and people run past and you have to catch them.When you catch one they join with you. {DEATH SQUARE }Is a game where you are in a square with a football.If you kick it out of the square you have to run out before you get kicked and if you touch it twice you have to run past people kicking and punching you.
